document.full_text: a hong kong jury on friday unanimously found an american woman guilty of murder following a protracted retrial over the killing of her merrill lynch investment banker husband in 2003.
document.title: kissel loses in hong kong "milkshake murder" retrial
lines_and_colors: a hong kong jury on friday unanimously found an american woman guilty of murder following a protracted retrial over the killing of her merrill lynch investment banker husband in 2003.
